title: Quantum physics legend Stephen Hawking dies at 76
text:
Quantum physics legend Stephen Hawking dies at 76 2:32pm GMT - 02:16 
British theoretical physicist Stephen Hawking has died at the age of 76. His best-selling book ''A Brief History of Time'' made him a household name, and sought to explain complex science to the masses. Reuters Ben Hirschler reports on his legacy.
